authdriver.name: ldap
authdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP/AD Directory]
authdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Authentication datas are stored in an LDAP/AD directory.]

param.name: LDAP_CONNECTION_LEGEND
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set up main connection to server. Use the button to test that your parameters are correct.]

param.name: LDAP_URL
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP URL]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Server URL (IP or name)]

param.name: LDAP_PROTOCOL
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Protocol]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Connect through ldap or ldaps]

param.name: LDAP_PORT
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Port]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Server Port (leave blank for default)]

param.name: LDAP_USER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP bind username]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Username (uid + dn) of LDAP bind user]

param.name: LDAP_PASSWORD
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP bind password]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Password of LDAP bind user]

param.name: LDAP_USERS_LEGEND
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[These parameters will describe how the users will be loaded/filtered from the directory.]

param.name: LDAP_DN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[People DN]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[DN where the users are stored]

param.name: LDAP_FILTER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Filter]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Filter which users to fetch.]

param.name: LDAP_USERATTR
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[User attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Username attribute]

param.name: TEST_USER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Test User]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use the Test Connexion button to check if this user is correctly found in your LDAP directory.]

param.name: TEST_LDAP
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Test Connexion]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Try to connect to LDAP]

param.name: LDAP_GROUPS_LEGEND
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[These parameters will describe how groups will optionally be loaded/filtered from the directory.]

param.name: LDAP_GDN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Groups DN]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[DN where the groups are stored. Must be used in cunjonction with a group parameter mapping, generally using the memberOf feature.]

param.name: LDAP_GROUP_FILTER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Groups Filter]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Filter which groups to fetch.]

param.name: LDAP_GROUPATTR
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Group attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Group main attribute to be used as a label]

param.name: LDAP_GROUP_PREFIX
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Role Prefix (for memberof)]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Role prefix when you mapping memberof => roleID]

param.name: LDAP_MAPPING_LEGEND
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use this section to automatically map some LDAP attributes to Pydio plugins parameters values.]

param.name: MAPPING_LDAP_PARAM
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Name of the LDAP attribute to read]

param.name: MAPPING_LOCAL_TYPE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Mapping Type]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Determine the type of mapping]

param.name: MAPPING_LOCAL_PARAM
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Plugin parameter]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Name of the custom local parameter to set]

param.name: LDAP_ADVANCED_LEGEND
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[More advanced settings for LDAP/AD]

param.name: LDAP_FAKE_MEMBEROF
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Fake Member from...]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If there is no memberOf attribute/overlay, use this option to create additional memberOf attribute. Enter the groups attribute storing the members ids, can be generally either memberUid or member, depending on the schema.]

param.name: LDAP_RECURSIVE_MEMBEROF
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Search MemberOf recursively. (use with AD only)]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Search all values of MemberOf including nested groups]

param.name: LDAP_VALUE_MEMBERATTR_IN_GROUP
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Fake MemberOf. value of member/memberUid attribute of group]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[value of member/memberUid attribute of group: can be user DN or user CN. Use with Fake memberOf enabled. YES use DN, otherwise CN]

param.name: LDAP_SEARCHUSER_ATTR
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Search Users by Attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[When looking for a user through autocomplete, search on a specific parameter instead of user ID]

param.name: LDAP_PAGE_SIZE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Server page size]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Page size of LDAP Server]

param.name: LDAP_REFERRAL_BIND
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Use referral bind]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use referral bind]

param.name: LDAP_COUNT_CACHE_TTL
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Cache User Count (hours)]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Locally cache the total number of users during X hours. Can be handy for huge directories.]
